text: Is Paris Burning () is a 1966 French American World War II drama movie directed by René Clément and was based on the Larry Collins and Dominique Lapierre. It stars Kirk Douglas, Jean-Pierre Cassel, Jean-Paul Belmondo, Alain Delon, Charles Boyer, Simone Signoret, Glenn Ford, Anthony Perkins, Leslie Caron and was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1967. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 war movies Category:1960s epic movies Category:French movies Category:American war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies about Nazi Germany Category:Movies directed by René Clément Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 20th century Category:Movies set in Paris
title: Is Paris Burning?
